name: ACRALOCK® SA1-05A
description: ACRALOCK® SA1-05A is a single base methacrylate adhesive formulated to be used with different activators. Will provide a range of working times when mixed at a 1:1 ratio with SA1-05BNAT or SA1-15BNAT activators. The Component A can also be used with a few other Component B activators – either pigmented Gray activators or HS type activators. These products are formulated to be primerless on most metal surfaces and will adhere to assemblies of thermoset composites and most plastics.
company_name: ACRALOCK STRUCTURAL ADHESIVES - ENGINEERED BONDING SOLUTIONS
